item.title: Regex like operators for DCG
item.description: Today I was trying to create a simple parser to count syllables in latin words with Prolog. I usually use DCGs in Prolog for parsing. Their semantic is very similar to BNF. I love DCGs, but sometimes the verbosity in some cases annoys me. Take the following example: consonant --> "b"; "c"; "d"; "f"; "g"; "h"; "l"; "j"; "k"; "m"; "n"; "p"; "q"; "r"; "s"; "t"; "v"; "x"; "z". consonants --> [].
